name: Sweet Kitty Meow-tain: A "Racing" Game
description:
Controls are WASD and you can press backspace to restart and esc to quit the game.

In Sweet Kitty Meow-tain, you play as a sphere character piloting a derby car, racing through a sweet course collecting collectables (up to 40) to get to the mouth of a cat.

This is the final product of an animation and games fundamentals course I took. I'm really only uploading this so my friends can play :3.  Really simple game made just for learning all the fundamentals of Maya and Unity. Enjoy!!

Also, tried very hard to get a third person view camera, could not figure it out for the life of me, so I had to use the mechanics provided by the professors. If anyone knows how to get a proper third person camera (similar to a mario kart view) pls comment here or reach out to me on tumblr or instagram (kitcattmoon). Thanks!

Models made by me, most coding provided by the course.

Sound effects created by me, except for final winning sound, which is from the ADHD creature meme.

Music is from pixabay, and is Night Walk by SergeQuadrado sped up.
